=head2 Miscellaneous

=head3 Prefers 24 hour time?

Yes

=head3 Local first day of the week

1 (lunis)

=head2 Strftime Patterns

=head3 %c (%a %d %b %Y %T %Z) - date time format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = mar 05 fre 2008 18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = che 22 nad 1995 09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sàb 15 cab -10 04:44:23 UTC

=head3 %x (%d. %m. %y) - date format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 05. 02. 08
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22. 12. 95
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15. 09. 10

=head3 %X (%T) - time format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23

See L<DateTime::Locale>.
